comment: No attendance mandatory, though recommended. Class is helpful in understanding the material and example problems of the cryptographic algorithms, which match the test. 1st test allowed a whole page of notes, 2nd/3rd were open book. She was very helpful when I had something come up. Dr. Zhang is a good professor, I recommend taking her.

Very good professor, really wants you to understand the content. Not a tough grader. It got a little overwhelming at the end of the semester, but otherwise not bad on workload. 3 Assignments, 2 tests, and a semester-long project that you can do alone or in a group. Very responsive to emails. Would love to have her class again in the future.
